name: Big win
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-5-task-3.png)

In 2013, a British man managed to win more than 200,000 pounds with a minimum bet of one penny.
That is, the amount of money he had increased by a factor of 20000000!

Create a `money` variable and assign it a value of 1.

Then write a command that increases the value of the `money` variable by 20000000 times.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what you need to do,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
let a = 5;
a = a * 1000;
```
